Attendees will receive preferential seating on the show floor.<br><br>This ticket must be activated from your in-game backpack. Once activated, the ticket will be consumed and removed from your backpack and registered on your Steam account. Ticket information will be emailed no later than June 30th, 2012 to the email address associated with your Steam account.<br><br>This purchase also includes a tradable Dota 2 Invite that grants access to the game (PC only)."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Drum_of_Tales"	"Every generation has a seer to act as chronicler and teller of old tales.  As each one dies, a small handful of their bones are preserved and placed in the drum so that their spirit might infuse the telling of old tales.  Though the drum itself has been replaced many times, the oldest bones within are hundreds of years old."

"DOTA_Item_Wyvernguard_Edge"	"飞龙守护之锋"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Wyvernguard_Edge"	"Wyvernguard Edge"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Wyvernguard_Edge"	"这可不是砍树的小斧子，飞龙守护之锋是带着神龙之噬的巨斧。用骑士的熔钢锻造，在多头被斩杀的飞龙那灼热的内脏里加热，飞龙守护之刃将直接穿透任何战斗的交战中心。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Wyvernguard_Edge"	"No mere woodcutter's hatchet, the Wyvernguard Edge is a great-axe with the bite of a dragon.  Forged from the knights' steel found fused and glowing in the molten guts of a dozen slaughtered Pyrexae, the blade of Wyvernguard penetrates to the bleeding heart of any battle."
"DOTA_Item_Bow_of_the_Howling_Wind"	"呼啸狂风之弓"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Bow_of_the_Howling_Wind"	"Bow of the Howling Wind"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Howling_Wind_Bow"	"在遥远北方无尽的寒冷中，相传死亡的寒意是由一头巨大的白狼带来的呼啸狂风所承载。无数的猎人有意屠杀这只象征着坟墓的灵兽。但是在所有可考的历史中，记录的只有一把射了无数支箭，命中无数敌人的神弓。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Howling_Wind_Bow"	"In the endless chill of the far north, it is said that the cold of death comes on a howling wind brought by a great white wolf.  Many a hunter has attempted to slay this grave spirit.  Yet in all the known histories, the stories record only one bow that has ever fired strong enough, and true enough, to pierce its side."
"DOTA_Item_Ice_Burst_Cloak"	"冰爆披风"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Ice_Burst_Cloak"	"Ice Burst Cloak"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Ice_Burst_Cloak"	"一件闪耀着冰霜的披风。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Ice_Burst_Cloak"	"A cloak of scintillating frost."
"DOTA_Item_Dolfrat_and_Roshinante"	"多弗瑞特和罗西南特"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Dolfrat_and_Roshinante"	"Dolfrat and Roshinante"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Dolfrat_and_Roshinante"	"“我怎么到这儿的？”经常听到巫师多弗瑞特说出这样的话语，他的魔力太过强大，连他自己都不能掌控。这是真的，他的敌人都谴责他完全没有一个法师应有的教养，最直接的证据是他的口头禅“这是我干的吗？”你可能曾经看到过多弗瑞特平躺在路上，那你就可以肯定他信赖的战马罗西南特就在附近某处——可能正以最快速度飞奔逃离一棵即将倒塌的树，或是类似拥有噩梦般力量的恶魔所具有的阴影。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dolfrat_and_Roshinante"	"\"How did I get here?\" Such words of power are commonly heard from Dolfrat the Wizard, whose magic is so great that even he cannot grasp it. Indeed, his enemies accuse him of having no magical training whatsoever, pointing to the evidence of his most frequent incantation: \"Did I do that?\" And should you ever spy the mighty Dolfrat flat on his back in the road, you can be sure his trusty steed Roshinante is somewhere nearby--probably galloping at top speed away from a creaky tree or shadow that resembled a demon of nightmarish power."
"DOTA_Item_Braze_the_Zonkey"	"斑驴小布"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Braze_the_Zonkey"	"Braze the Zonkey"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Braze_the_Zonkey"	"在一次传统迁移中走失后它穿越了一个四维空间，这使它和它的族群分开了。虽然在这块新的土地上它有些显眼，但除了敌方英雄，它没有任何天敌！"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Braze_the_Zonkey"	"Separated from his herd when disruptions to the traditional migratory route took it through a tesseract, he stands out a bit in this new habitat. But that's all right. Apart from enemy heroes, he has no natural predators!"
"DOTA_Item_Pennant_DK"	"DK战队锦旗"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Pennant_DK"	"DK Pennant"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_DK"	"购买该战队锦旗来表现您对DK战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。升级锦旗代表着您是认真的！另外，装备锦旗后，在观看您支持的队伍的赛事直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品，这些赛事包括国际邀请赛和其他Valve将来可能指定的赛事。DK锦旗能和其他粉丝的DK锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持队伍的粉丝总数量。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Pennant_DK"	"Show your support for DK by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during the International 2012, and other tournaments Valve may designate in the future.  DK pennants can be combined with other DK pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_International_Treasure_Key"	"Used to open both the <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Champions</font> and the <font color='#9da1a9'>Treasure of Challengers</font>.
Double click or right-click the key in your backpack and select the chest you want to open.
After the end of September 3rd, 2012 this will become a normal key."

Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during the International 2012, and other tournaments Valve may designate in the future.  NaVi pennants can be combined with other NaVi pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."

	Legends also tell of those few who have dared face the dangerous trials required to harness the power of these creatures for themselves. 
	
	For the only way to return after stealing the egg of a stormcrow - a potent source of power - is to wrestle control of one of the enormous black birds and ride it down to the ground, miles below.  Includes all of the items in 'The Stormcrow's Spirit' set for Witch Doctor:"

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Brood_Queen_Set"	"Many are the knights and noble youths who have intruded on the hunting grounds of the Broodmother, disturbing her peace with the clatter of armor, their boots setting atwitch her silken web. The intruders are like succulent shelled insects upon whose innards she's gorged, all the while growing curious of the adornments that drape their bodies, until that day when a blacksmith found his way into her web.  Armor he promised her, the finest in the land, if only she would set him free. And so a deal was struck, and the blacksmith measured, and toiled, taking as his materials the finest steel to be found among the husked corpses of silk-wrapped knights.  When the new armor was finished, the spider kept her promise and set the blacksmith free.  Then she watched her brood devour him. Contains all of the items in the 'Brood Queen' set for Broodmother:"

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Alliance"	"购买该战队锦旗来表现您对Alliance战队的支持吧！请将其装备在玩家装备页面的“粉丝槽位”中，告诉其他观众您在为谁加油鼓劲。升级锦旗代表着您是认真的！另外，装备锦旗后，在Valve所支持的赛事中观看您支持的队伍的比赛直播时，您将有机会获得掉落物品。Alliance锦旗能和其他粉丝的Alliance锦旗结合来升级您的队伍锦旗粉丝级别。您的锦旗级别将会在您观看比赛的时候提高您所支持的队伍的粉丝总价值。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Alliance"	"Show your support for Team Alliance by buying this Team Pennant! Equip it in the 'fan slot' of your Player Loadout to show other spectators who you're rooting for. Upgrade it to show you mean business! In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Team Alliance pennants can be combined with other Team Alliance pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Dignitas"	"购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！

只要兵器库中拥有战队锦旗，在观看游戏内锦标赛时就会反映在相应队伍的锦旗分数中，而且观看时还将有机会获得掉落物品。多个相同战队的锦旗可以合并，使战队的锦旗分数相应地增加。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Dignitas"	"Show your support with a Team Pennant!
	
	Having a Team Pennant in your Armory will increase that team's Pennant Score which is shown during matches in Valve-supported tournaments, and it will make you eligible to receive item drops while spectating their live tournament matches. Pennants for the same team can be combined to increase their contribution to that team's Pennant Score."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_Ticket"	"这一物品是邀请玩家于2013年8月7日 - 8月11日期间前往华盛顿州西雅图市观看Dota 2国际邀请赛的邀请函。前去观看的玩家将获得现场预定座位。

<br><br>该门票必须从您的游戏内背包中激活。一旦激活，门票就会被消耗，并从背包中移除，同时通过Steam账号注册。门票信息将在2013年6月30日之前以电子邮件的形式发送到您Steam账号关联的电子邮箱中。<br><br>

另外本次购买还包括一份2013年国际邀请赛互动指南和一只打铁小恶魔信使。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_International_2013_Ticket"	"This item is an invitation to personally attend the Dota 2 International Tournament, August 7 - 11 2013, at Benaroya Hall in Seattle, WA. Attendees will receive preferential seating on the show floor.<br><br>This ticket must be activated from your in-game backpack. Once activated, the ticket will be consumed and removed from your backpack and registered on your Steam account. Ticket information will be emailed to the email address associated with your Steam account.<br><br>This purchase also includes a International 2013 Interactive Compendium and Smeevil Courier."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Bit_of_Boat"	"一名昆卡手下的逃兵差点就坐着这艘宿命的小船上岸了。潮汐猎人选它做武器就是为了提醒那可怕的一天，丝毫不知昆卡是打心眼儿里赞同这船预示的叛徒下场。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_A_Bit_of_Boat"	"A mutinous member of Kunkka's crew nearly made it to shore in this fateful craft. Tidehunter wields it as a reminder of that dread day, little knowing that Kunkka heartily approves of the message it sends to would-be deserters."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Admirals_Prow"	"在战栗群岛的首次战役中从一名被击败的船长头上取走作为上贡之物，上将舰首是昆卡最为自豪的战利品，也是能配得上水手主人的帽子。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Admirals_Prow"	"Taken as tribute from the head of a defeated captain after the first battle of Trembling isles, the Admiral's Prow is one of Kunkka's proudest war trophies, and a hat worthy of a master sailor. "

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AetherWings"	"Puck's wings exist in a realm slightly offset from the rest of it, and are subject to unsynchronized molts and unpredictable fluctuations of form."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Alphid_of_Lecaciida"	"雷克希达的绿蝇领地几百年来繁衍生息，居住在树人的枝干上，靠不老巨人的树浆为生。在巢穴中有一只叫做小绿蚜的绿蝇，他的敏捷快速和好奇的天性让他脱颖而出。一天晚上，他离开了领地启程去寻找自己的命运，他深信自己超常的速度和奉献精神将会在战场上发挥强大的作用。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Alphid_of_Lecaciida"	"The greenfly colony of Lecaciida had lived and thrived for centuries, inhabiting the trunks of Treants and nourishing themselves on the sap of those ageless giants. Among the hive was a young greenfly named Alphid who had distinguished himself through his agility, swiftness, and curious nature. One night, he left the colony and set out to find his own destiny, convinced that his exceptional speed and dedication could be put to good use on the battlefield."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Blotto_and_Stick"	"他原来是一名赌徒，也是个骗子，布洛陀的滑稽姿势曾经出现在从这里到斯洛姆王国沿途大大小小的水坑、赌窝和陷阱中。现在他慢慢地开始洗心革面，承担起信使的责任，趁机骗走几个金币。他还带上了忠心耿耿的棍子来凑热闹！"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Blotto_and_Stick"	"A former gambler and shyster, the antics of Blotto were once known in every watering hole, gambling den and sleaze pit from here to Slom.  Now on the slow path to reform, he's taken up courier duties to con a bit of extra coin and brought his trusty Stick along for the ride!"

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Gallows_Understudy_Set"	"Far from the temples of the Flayed Twins, Bloodseeker stumbled upon a land that lauded execution above sacrifice, relying on hempen rope and metal blades instead of black stone and the will of bloodthirsty gods. Yet there was something in their crude approach that appealed to him, and so he spent a season studying the executioners, watching from the crowd that turned out for every morbid spectacle, until he realized that the mob itself was the god to whom they made their sacrifices. With a leer that matched those to be seen on the faces of the enrapt audience, he made his way home to share the lessons he had learned with his own bloody masters of the priestly caste. 
	
	Includes all items from the Gallows Understudy Set."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Alliance"	"Show your support with a Team Pennant!
	
	Having a Team Pennant in your Armory will increase that team's Pennant Score which is shown during matches in Valve-supported tournaments, and it will make you eligible to receive item drops while spectating their live tournament matches. Pennants for the same team can be combined to increase their contribution to that team's Pennant Score."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_AL_Pennant"	"Show your support with a Team Pennant!
	
	Having a Team Pennant in your Armory will increase that team's Pennant Score which is shown during matches in Valve-supported tournaments, and it will make you eligible to receive item drops while spectating their live tournament matches. Pennants for the same team can be combined to increase their contribution to that team's Pennant Score."

Pennants for the same team can be combined to increase their contribution to that team's Pennant Score."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Zenith_Pennant"	"购买战队锦旗来表现您对战队的支持吧！

只要兵器库中拥有战队锦旗，在观看游戏内锦标赛时就会反映在相应队伍的锦旗分数中，而且观看时还将有机会获得掉落物品。多个相同战队的锦旗可以合并，使战队的锦旗分数相应地增加。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Zenith_Pennant"	"Show your support with a Team Pennant!
	
	Having a Team Pennant in your Armory will increase that team's Pennant Score which is shown during matches in Valve-supported tournaments, and it will make you eligible to receive item drops while spectating their live tournament matches. Pennants for the same team can be combined to increase their contribution to that team's Pennant Score."

战斗点数飞升的效果持续时间只有在获得战斗点数的过程中才会被消耗，在游戏内观战或者作为教练指导并不会消耗时间。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_80_Battle_Point_Booster_500_minutes"	"Use this item to increase the rate at which you earn <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> by <font color='#9da1a9'>80%</font> for 500 game minutes. Additionally, you will grant other players a stacking <font color='#9da1a9'>16%</font> bonus to their <font color='#9da1a9'>Battle Points</font> rate.<br><br>
	Battle Point Boosters are only consumed whenever Battle Points are earned and features like spectating games or coaching do not deplete them."

Hearing of his power, Lion seeked to harvest his parts for a fresh demonoplasty. After a strenuous battle he defeated Buki'vak and gained the hand he desired as a reward, but it was not without cost. Just as his previous hand transformed him, so did this one. He became afflicted with the Malignant Corruption, causing unseemly shards of Obsidian to grow from his body and further disfigure him into something even more unrecognizeable from his original form."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Scepter_of_Corrupted_Amber"	"位于沉没之城下方的地狱谷里住着堕落之王布吉瓦克，他永世都在深海中扩张着自己的势力。听闻他的力量后，莱恩就动身去获取他的身体，将其移植到自己身上。经过一番激烈的交战，莱恩将其打败，并如愿以偿地得到他的手臂。但是这并非意味着没有代价。就跟他上一条手臂一样，这条手臂也让他面目全非。他被邪恶堕落的力量所感染，身上长出了诡异的黑曜碎片，与原来的形态已经大相径庭。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Scepter_of_Corrupted_Amber"	"Far away beneath the Sunken Cities and through the Infernal Hollow, Buki'vak the Corrupted dwells in the depths forever expanding his corruption throughout the sea. Hearing of his power, Lion seeked to harvest his parts for a fresh demonoplasty. After a strenuous battle he defeated Buki'vak and gained the hand he desired as a reward, but it was not without cost. Just as his previous hand transformed him, so did this one. He became afflicted with the Malignant Corruption, causing unseemly shards of Obsidian to grow from his body and further disfigure him into something even more unrecognizeable from his original form."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Snowdrop"	"水晶室女在学习冰霜法术时有着不为人知的故事，她曾经极大的触怒了她的导师，为了能够重新获得导师的恩宠并证明自己值得被教导，她在蓝心冰川与沸腾之海交界处的融雪淤泥里面居住了一年。这里永世无雪，瑞莱进行了数月的深度冥想，以掌握自己的力量。一天下午，在醒来之时她轻启芳唇，念出一个冰冷的词：“雪落！”转瞬之间原本充斥四周的蒸汽结为寒冰，原本温暖的水珠化作飘雪。当她回到她导师处时，她发现导师早已带着微笑在等她，对她的魔法杰作俨然已经知晓，于是他将这套衣服送给了她，以彰显她的价值和技艺。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Winter_Snowdrop"	"It is little known of Crystal Maiden, that in her long study of the Frozen Arts, she once greatly displeased her Ice Wizard master and to restore herself to his graces and prove worthy of his instruction, she passed a year dwelling in the climes of slush where the Blueheart Glacier spends itself at the edge of the Boiling Sea. Here, where snow had never fallen, Rylai spent months in deep meditation, mastering her powers, before waking one afternoon with a single frigid word upon her lips: 'Snowdrop!' For a moment, the steam that filled the air turned to ice, and the warm precipitation became a softly falling snow. When she returned to her old teacher, she found him waiting with a smile, fully aware of the magic she had wrought, as he presented her this outfit to show her worth and mastery."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Cowl_of_Ice"	"In the frigid north, that which is lost to myth may still be found within the ice. In an age now lost to time, the Frozen Witch Yulsaria ruled the whitelands, summoning blizzards and hail storms upon those who displeased her, while an army of ice golems roamed the lands to snuff out all warmth. In time, her southward expansion angered the Eldwurm Slyrak who, in his terrible rage, melted Yulsaria's armies with his endless flame before conquering the Frozen Witch herself. Now, centuries later, shifts in the ice have heaved up the last remaining shard of her empire: her glacial crown."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Hand_of_Glory_Staff"	"A week of incantations were spent to pierce beyond the mortal realm and consort with what lay beyond. Finally, a sliver of infernal light appeared and from depths unknown rumbled a distant wail of suffering and anger. The wretched sound grew and grew into a deafening roar before a hellborn claw reached through the burning tear into the world. Yet in its unseeing fury the invading appendage disrupted the ritual, and the vile mouth from whence it sprang suddenly closed shut, forever severing the vile hand from its unknowable owner."

In addition, equipping a pennant makes you eligible for item drops while you spectate your team's matches live during Valve supported tournaments.  Pennants can be combined with other pennants to upgrade your Team Pennant fan level.  The level of your Team Pennant will increase the total fan value of the team when you are spectating a Tournament match. "

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Wall_Totem"	"大地生之，大地灭之。经过地岩的不断挤压，万物都将化为尘埃。远在不可考的时代，强大的石巨人建造了众多城市。而现在皆已变成绵延不绝的卵石之海。石海中央裂开了一条巨大的沟壑，里面是无数石巨人的碎石遗骸。如今只有一根石柱的其中一段依然在纪念这个远古文明的消亡。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Dragon_Wall_Totem"	"That which the strength of earth may create, the strength of earth may destroy, chewed into dust by shifting rock. Where once, in a time before knowledge of time, great stone giants built their cities, now lies an endless sea of pebbles. At its center yawns a great fissure, filled with the gravel remains of the countless many. Only a single segment of a single pillar remains to mark a grave for this ancient civilization."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Empyrean"	"天怒一族中流传着莎尔德拉的传奇，她的翅膀黝黑，不顾众人的劝阻向黑暗的苍穹飞去，一心想要遇见天上的诸神。后来她回来了，翅膀上的羽毛变成了金色，手上还拿着九天玄杖，这把神杖让她在空中异常耀眼。据说她在位的时间长达一千又一年。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Empyrean"	"'Tis told among Skywrath-kind the legend of Shaldera, a being of black wing who in hubris flew into the darker skies hoping to meet the heavenly lords above. She who returned did so upon golden feathers, bearing the divine spear Empyrean, a symbol of her flight. It is said her kingdom endured for a thousand years and one."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Skadi"	"在深渊的沉没之牢里，斯拉克挖到了这把斯嘉蒂之刃。这把神秘的大刀让他看到了越狱的希望，并且在越狱途中帮助他打败了敌人。从此以后，斯嘉蒂之刃和斯拉克一同在世上无从追寻。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eye_of_Skadi"	"In the depth of Sunken Prison, Slark once dug up this Skadi Blade. This mysterious weapon gave him hope of escape from Sunken and power to defeat enemy on the escape way. Since then, Skadi Blade and Slark disappeared together in world."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Flourishing_Lodestar"	"在原初之林的树荫下，清澈的溪流，散发着温暖的大地。翠绿的丛林里精灵们忙碌着修修补补，年迈的生命藉由他们焕然一新。北极星正是寻找常年没有长大的树苗，取其枝条雕刻而成，它将帮助大自然中友善的仆人指引、治疗并保护受到珍视的一切。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Flourishing_Lodestar"	"In the shade of the first trees, water runs clear, and the earth radiates a gentle warmth. The spirits of the verdant wild coil about, endlessly mending, and eternally twisting old life into new. From the boughs of these elder saplings was carved the Lodestar, a tool to aid nature's benevolent servants so that they may guide, heal, and preserve all that must be held dear."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Newbee"	"Show your support with a Team Pennant!
	
	Having a Team Pennant in your Armory will increase that team's Pennant Score which is shown during matches in Valve-supported tournaments, and it will make you eligible to receive item drops while spectating their live tournament matches. Pennants for the same team can be combined to increase their contribution to that team's Pennant Score."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Team_Pennant_Titan"	"Show your support with a Team Pennant!
	
	Having a Team Pennant in your Armory will increase that team's Pennant Score which is shown during matches in Valve-supported tournaments, and it will make you eligible to receive item drops while spectating their live tournament matches. Pennants for the same team can be combined to increase their contribution to that team's Pennant Score."

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Doomling"	"Fear Doomling, the courier who burns and is not consumed.  What he lacks in size, he makes up for by being Lucifer, fiery lord of Darkness.  For One such as Doomling, being your courier is hell. "
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Empyrean"	"天怒一族中流传着莎尔德拉的传奇，她的翅膀黝黑，不顾众人的劝阻向黑暗的苍穹飞去，一心想要遇见天上的诸神。后来她回来了，翅膀上的羽毛变成了金色，手上还拿着九天玄杖，这把神杖让她在空中异常耀眼。据说她在位的时间长达一千又一年。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Empyrean"	"'Tis told among Skywrath kind the legend of Shaldera, a being of black wing who in hubris flew into the darker skies hoping to meet the heavenly lords above. She who returned did so upon golden feathers, bearing the divine spear Empyrean a symbol of her flight. It is said her kingdom lasted for a thousand years and one."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gravelmaw"	"大地生之，大地灭之。经过地岩的不断挤压，万物都将化为尘埃。远在不可考的时代，强大的石巨人建造了众多城市。而现在皆已变成绵延不绝的卵石之海。石海中央裂开了一条巨大的沟壑，里面是无数石巨人的碎石遗骸。如今只有一根石柱的其中一段依然在纪念这个远古文明的消亡。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Gravelmaw"	"That which the strength of earth may create, the strength of earth may destroy, chewed into dust by shifting rock. Where once, in a time before knowledge of time, great stone giants built their cities, now lies an endless sea of pebbles. At its center yawns a great fissure, filled with the gravel remains of the countless many. Only a single segment of a single pillar remains to mark a grave for this ancient civilization."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lamb_to_the_Slaughter"	"这段咒语是很久以前由法师发明，用于对抗失眠，吟唱过后能使人马上开始数绵羊，不过数来数去都只有一只。暗影萨满只需轻轻挥动手里的神杖，念出这段咒语就能让最凶恶的狼也披上羊皮。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Lamb_to_the_Slaughter"	"Invented long ago as a way to combat insomnia, this spell will have you counting sheep in no time.  Provided you can only count to one.  With a wave of his wand, Shadow Shaman can clad even the deadliest wolf in sheep's clothing."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Severing_Crest"	"面对狭窄迷宫的守卫也敢抬头那就是拒绝接受轮回。而世上就是有人反抗自己的命运，对施刑之人进行抗争，最终落得更加悲惨的下场。他们用不了多久就会发现自己在最黑暗的冥河上飘摇，生生世世都只能在此徘徊。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Copy_of_Severing_Crest"	"To face the guardians of the Narrow Maze is to deny eternity itself. Yet there are those who would dare defy their fate and strike at the source of their torment, only to be thrown down time and again. These insolent few may soon find themselves flung to the darkest reaches of the herebetween, and left to wander fateless, for all eternity."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Frull"	"这是什么奇葩的野兽？哈，这是弗拉尔— 忠实的四蹄搬运工。虽然并非人类但她的确是淑女，而你的东西对她来说根本就是鸿毛！"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frull"	"What strange beast is this? Why, it's Frull--faithful four- footed freighter of mercantile wares. She may be a beast but she's also a lady, and your goods are never a burden to her!"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Pale_Mausoleum"	"挽歌自地底呼号而上。它的召唤无人能挡，黑暗和冰冷是它的音符。万物都逃不过它的魔力，无论是暴君还是平民，战士还是巫师。挽歌将夺去一切生灵。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Pale_Mausoleum"	"The dirge howls from the deep. Its call is irresistible, its song a melody of dark and cold. All will fall under the spell, be they tyrant or peasant, soldier or thief. The dirge shall claim."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Splattering_Forcipule"	"基迪岛上最黑暗的丛林恰恰是可怕生物的乐园。作为多足节虫家族的远亲，飞溅钳棘多见于潮湿的裂缝或者树根的间隙。他们自出生后就不会移动，如果有生物不识相向他们靠近，他们会对其射出致命的毒液，用不了多久就会毒发身亡，死后毒液还有帮助消化的功能。倒霉鬼死去后，遗骸会不断降解，被身下的土地快速吸收，这样钳棘在地下盘旋的根须还能对养分进行二次吸收。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Splattering_Forcipule"	"The darkest wilds of Jidi Isle are home to wondrous horrors. A distant relative to the Spitterpede family, the Splattering Forcipule can often be found growing in damp crevices or between the roots of trees. They will spend their entire lives bound to a single location, and the toxic venom they eject upon any creature foolish enough wander nearby is often more than sufficient to poison the hapless victim, as well as begin its digestion. Once this poor soul expires, their melting remains are quickly absorbed into the earth where they fall, allowing the Forcipule's subterranean root-tendrils to absorb the nutrients."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Swift_Claw"	"逃离他的愤怒很容易。将他回荡的咆哮抛诸脑后也不难。然后你逃到了一片空地上，或者峡谷里，看不到追杀之人的踪影，以为自己已经安全了。结果突然间，他的利爪找到了你，然后就没有然后了。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Swift_Claw"	"You may flee from his rage. You may leave his echoing roar far behind. And you may think yourself safe, perhaps in a clearing or canyon, with no sign of your pursuer. Then, suddenly, his claws find you, and it is the last you know."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternal_Machine_Head"	"这个可怜的生意人怪他的工具无法用于战斗，但事实上商场就是战场，工具则是战斗中的命根。正是因为这个原因，瑞托崔普早已着手将他自己转变为族人前所未见的最强大的战争道具。通过数年不间断的自我修炼，他最终获得了最具毁灭性的的力量，踏上战场的他被称为永恒机械。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Eternal_Machine_Head"	"Tis a poor tradesman who blames his tools, but when your tradecraft is warfare, your tools take on a particular importance. Constantly improving himself over the course of many years, he has now finally reached the pinnacle of destructive power, stepping onto the battlefield as the Eternal Machine."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_Golden_Empyrean"	"天怒一族中流传着莎尔德拉的传奇，她的翅膀黝黑，不顾众人的劝阻向黑暗的苍穹飞去，一心想要遇见天上的诸神。后来她回来了，翅膀上的羽毛变成了金色，手上还拿着九天玄杖，这把神杖让她在空中异常耀眼。据说她在位的时间长达一千又一年。"

"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Manifold_Paradox"	"Weapon evolves by earning points. Any match won using Phantom Assassin will earn you 1 point. Earning 40 points will upgrade the weapon to Level 2, and earning 100 points causes the weapon to reach its maximum evolution.<br><br>
	With a raspy cackle, the elder smith Craler swung the sword that his family had spent eleven generations to fold and forge. So sharp it was that, with a sound like tearing fabric, a rip in reality tore open. Through this rip, Craler recognized himself from moments before, holding aloft the very same coveted blade. Then, in a fit of greed and madness, he cut this earlier self down to seize the twin sword as his own. Too late, however, Craler felt a familiar wound, and was suddenly filled with the memory of being cut down himself..."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche"	"有人说，这件衣服最初是一位古代女王大婚时所穿的喜袍。在其他人口中，这曾经是冰霜食人魔战甲中的斗篷。实际上，由于衣料带有魔力，寒裘就像雪崩一样具有很高的可塑性，可以将自己塑造为多种形态。现在的形态吸引了一只孤独的幼狼，而如今他已成为耐寒的忠诚伙伴。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Frost_Avalanche"	"Some say the garment began as the wedding gown of an ancient queen.  Others say it was once a battle cloak of a frost ogre. In truth, the enchanted fabric is as malleable as an avalanche, and can mold itself into various forms. This form has attracted a lone wolf pup, who has now become a hardy and loyal companion."

Pennants for the same team can be combined to increase their contribution to that team's Pennant Score."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_The_BTS_Series_"	"在接下来的一年里，BTS将投资总计18万美元的奖金，举办三个地区（美国，东南亚和欧洲）的18项比赛。系列赛将为新秀战队提供竞技的平台，在一系列的短期线上赛事中发掘天才选手。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_BTS_Series_"	"Over the next year, BTS will invest $180,000 USD in total prize pool for 18 competitions spread across three distinct regions: America, Southeast Asia, and Europe. The tournament series will provide a competitive platform for up and coming teams to develop talent and synergy through a series of shorter online events."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_JJ_Lins_Timekeeper_Music_Pack_Bundle"	"包含林俊杰的“时光守护者”音乐包和圣堂刺客的“时光守护者”套装。圣堂刺客的“时光守护者”套装设计灵感来自于林俊杰的“时线Timeline”世界巡回演唱会。在钟鸣的世界里，时光有限也异常珍贵。从音乐到游戏，他将时光守护者的角色灌注到圣堂刺客的身上。套装为金色和银色两种流线设计，肩甲的两侧分别缀有JJ和SMG的标志。而圣堂刺客的紫色色调也正好是林俊杰的特殊色。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_JJ_Lins_Timekeeper_Music_Pack_Bundle"	"Includes JJ Lin's Timekeeper Music Pack and 'The Timekeeper' set for Templar Assassin.
	
	The Timekeeper TA set draws inspiration from JJ Lin's Timeline World Tour. In the world where man chimes the hour, our days are precious precisely because they are limited. From music to gaming, he weaves his role of The Timekeeper into the Templar Assassin. The package is designed such that it comes in gold or silver lining, with JJ and SMG logo on each side of the shoulders. The Templar Assassin's characteristic colour is purple, which happens to be a special color for JJ as well."

圣堂刺客的“时光守护者”套装设计灵感来自于林俊杰的“时线Timeline”世界巡回演唱会。在钟鸣的世界里，时光有限也异常珍贵。从音乐到游戏，他将时光守护者的角色灌注到圣堂刺客的身上。套装为金色和银色两种流线设计，肩甲的两侧分别缀有JJ和SMG的标志。而圣堂刺客的紫色色调也正好是林俊杰的特殊色。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_The_Timekeeper"	"\"Swift, agile, silent and fast, Templar Assassin fits my favorite style of play in DOTA2.\" -JJ LIN
	
	The Timekeeper TA set draws inspiration from JJ Lin's Timeline World Tour. In the world where man chimes the hour, our days are precious precisely because they are limited. From music to gaming, he weaves his role of The Timekeeper into the Templar Assassin. The package is designed such that it comes in gold or silver lining, with JJ and SMG logo on each side of the shoulders. The Templar Assassin's characteristic colour is purple, which happens to be a special color for JJ as well."

《英雄试炼之肉山谷》通行证可以解锁：<br>
 8个额外角色保存栏位<br>
 18个额外装备栏位<br>
50%不朽掉落几率的状态加成和10%经验获取。此状态加成与队伍里所有成员共享，而且多名玩家的加成效果可以叠加。<br>
顶部界面的金钱击杀计数器会显示通行证状态。<br>
最重要的是，购买了通行证能直接支持游戏，让我们<br>
更快、更好、更心无旁骛地持续更新游戏。<br><br>
<b>游戏内容百分之一百保持免费状态。通行证玩家仅仅是获得了上述的加成效果，并且支持了游戏的长期发展。</b><br>
通行证在购买后的30天内有效，之后须重新购买。"

	A 50% immortal drop rate buff and 10% EXP gain. This buff is shared with all party members and stacks with other premium players.<br>

	Most importantly, purchasing a premium ticket supports the game and allows us <br>
	to build content better, faster, more consistently.<br><br>

	Every State mastered gives 3x Upgrade Protection Stone and 1x Injection Protection Stone.<br>
	Player resurrection time decreased by 5 seconds<br>
	Players receive 1x Demon Wolf Pellet at the start of the game<br>
	New skill animations, icons and effects<br>
	New function to see loot lists when you click on a creep or boss<br>
	New mode: GM's Dedication, summons a Game Master to defend your base for you while you freely roam the map and enjoy the game's content. Once enabled, you will not be able to join the speed-rank board.<br><br>
	Expires 30 days after purchase"

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Recycling_Immortal_for_2_International_2016_Levels"	"摧毁一件2016年国际邀请赛不朽物品，换取2级勇士令状等级。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Recycling_Immortal_for_2_International_2016_Levels"	"Recycle an International 2016 Immortal for 2 Battle Pass Levels."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_River_Vial_Blood"	"入手时拥有50点能量
<br><br>
拍卖自一位绝顶聪明但一事无成的炼金术士的财产，这些神秘的药瓶拥有将液态水转变成周围任何物质的力量。但是，药瓶需要能拿稳的双手。拍卖台上下一件东西就是奇术师他本人，一具打着喷嚏还不停渗水的尸体。真真是药（zuo）瓶（si）的艺术。
<br><br>
在游戏内商店可以领取河水药瓶。将药瓶倒入河道可以产生相应效果，持续10分钟。改变河水会使兵器库中相应物品消耗一点能量，不过若在游戏内出售、丢弃或摧毁物品并不会消耗能量。同一时间河水只能被一瓶药水作用。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_River_Vial_Blood"	"Initially comes with 50 charges
	<br><br>
	Auctioned from the estate of a brilliant but failed alchemist, these mystical vials have the power to transform liquid water into nearly any substance. However, a steady hand is required. The next item on the auction block was the seeping corpse of the sneezing thaumaturge himself. Vial art, indeed.
	<br><br>
	Claim your River Vial at the in-game shop. Pour the contents into the river to transform it for 10 minutes. Transforming the river will consume one charge from your Armory supply, however no charges will be used if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. Only one Vial can affect the river at a time."

	Auctioned from the estate of a brilliant but failed alchemist, these mystical vials have the power to transform liquid water into nearly any substance. However, a steady hand is required. The next item on the auction block was the pickled corpse of the sneezing thaumaturge himself. Vial art, indeed.
	<br><br>
	Claim your River Vial at the in-game shop. Pour the contents into the river to transform it for 10 minutes. Transforming the river will consume one charge from your Armory supply, however no charges will be used if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. Only one Vial can affect the river at a time."
"DOTA_Item_Desc_River_Vial_Slime"	"入手时拥有10点能量
<br><br>
拍卖自一位绝顶聪明但一事无成的炼金术士的财产，这些神秘的药瓶拥有将液态水转变成周围任何物质的力量。但是，药瓶需要能拿稳的双手。拍卖台上下一件东西就是奇术师他本人，一具打着喷嚏还不停渗水的尸体。真真是药（zuo）瓶（si）的艺术。
<br><br>
在游戏内商店可以领取河水药瓶。将药瓶倒入河道可以产生相应效果，持续10分钟。改变河水会使兵器库中相应物品消耗一点能量，不过若在游戏内出售、丢弃或摧毁物品并不会消耗能量。同一时间河水只能被一瓶药水作用。"

	<br><br>
	Claim your River Vial at the in-game shop. Pour the contents into the river to transform it for 10 minutes. Transforming the river will consume one charge from your Armory supply, however no charges will be used if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. Only one Vial can affect the river at a time."

"DOTA_Item_CDEC_University_League"	"CDEC大学联赛"
"[english]DOTA_Item_CDEC_University_League"	"CDEC University League"
"DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_University_League"	"CDEC大学联赛，是以单人匹配的个人积分赛。每名选手是通过系统匹配寻找队友和对手，比赛采用的是队长模式，和队友们赢得比赛来增加积分。只要注册，就可以随时参与比赛，没有传统活动安排的限制。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_CDEC_University_League"	"CDEC College League, is a single matching to individual points race, the game is through the system matching looking for teammates and opponents, Captain game mode, then and his teammates to win games to increase integration. As long as the registration can be involved in the match at any time after the match, there is no traditional event schedule restrictions."

The underlying tenets is \"competition spirit.\" \"E-sports China Dream\" for the vision to build a professional brand. Keeping the way of boutique competition to service society. We are devoted to develop E-sports and Cultural Diversity."

"DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Cavern_Luminar"	"在大地最深处的沉睡中，即将成为瑞格·石蹄的生命感觉到大量生物在意识的边缘移动。他们爬行的模式非常简单，放出微弱的唤醒之光，透过层层叠叠的石壁到达星光不可能照到的洞穴。"
"[english]DOTA_Item_Desc_Bracers_of_the_Cavern_Luminar"	"In the deepest grip of earth-bound slumber, the being who would become Raigor Stonehoof sensed a multitude of creatures moving at the edges of awareness.
